name: Pink Hand Technologies
overview:
Pink Hand Technologies Pvt Ltd is a faster growing Software Company in India with talented website designers, website developers and seo experts, located in Mohali, Punjab (North India).

We provide number of services such as .Net Development, PHP Development, Software Development, Multimedia, Design Solutions and Internet Marketing(SEO/SMM/SEM). We has been providing custom design and application development to clients in USA, UK, and India and around the world since 2008. When you choose Pink Hand Technologies Pvt Ltd, you can rest assured that your website will be first-rate and user friendly, developed with modern techniques. We manage growth by investing in infrastructure and by rapidly recruiting, training and deploying new professionals. Our first responsibility is to meet our customers’ requirements, to finish the project on time and within budget. With a customer main focus we certain our clients are satisfied every time and therefore we provide full support to our clients even beyond project completion.
